description.narrative: Adolescents and young people, especially girls, have enhanced capacity for citizen engagement in decision-making bodies in targeted areas., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The most deprived adolescents and youth are empowered to become social change agents towards creating an equitable, inclusive and peaceful society.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Adolescents and young people, especially girls, have enhanced capacity for citizen engagement in decision-making bodies in targetedareas.

description.narrative: Les cadres de redevabilité autorités – jeunes sont fonctionnels dans 9 communes sur 24 appuyées par UNICEF avec des contributions effectives à l’amélioration des services sociaux (santé, éducation, transport, sécurité alimentaire et nutritionnelle, assainissement, et collecte des taxes locales). Cependant, les jeunes marginalisés et non intégrés dans des réseaux associatifs formels restent exclus des politiques et actions au niveau national et local. La priorité donnée aux espaces de dialogue avec les jeunes dans la Déclaration de Politique Gouvernementale (Avril 2021) offre l’opportunité d’institutionnaliser la participation des jeunes dans la mandature des nouveaux élus au niveau national, régional et local. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2022
